headline: Qnity Electronics, Inc. Outlines Strategic Plan to Accelerate Growth as Future Independent Company at 2025 Investor Day
summary: Qnity, DuPont Electronics, ("Qnity"), a premier technology solutions leader across the semiconductor value chain, today hosted an Investor Day at the New York Stock Exchange. Video recordings of the presentation are now available to view via web replay on Qnity's Investor Relations site: https://ir.qnityelectronics.com/.

headline: DuPont Cuts Full-Year Sales Guidance to Reflect Divestiture, Spinoff
summary: DuPont cut its full-year sales guidance to reflect its previously-announced divestiture of its Aramids business along with the spinoff of its electronics unit.

raw.headline: DuPont Cuts Full-Year Sales Guidance to Reflect Divestiture, Spinoff
raw.summary: DuPont cut its full-year sales guidance to reflect its previously-announced divestiture of its Aramids business along with the spinoff of its electronics unit.

headline: DuPont de Nemours Lowers Q3, Full-Year Sales Outlook to Reflect Spin-Off
summary: DuPont de Nemours (DD) Thursday said it expects Q3 adjusted earnings of $1.06 per share on net sales

raw.headline: DuPont de Nemours Lowers Q3, Full-Year Sales Outlook to Reflect Spin-Off
raw.summary: DuPont de Nemours (DD) Thursday said it expects Q3 adjusted earnings of $1.06 per share on net sales

headline: DuPont revises 2025 net sales forecast to reflect Qnity spin-off
summary: The revised figure excludes results from Qnity Electronics, which will be separated on November 1, and the Aramids unit, which will be treated as discontinued operations beginning the third quarter.  DuPont also lowered its third-quarter adjusted profit forecast to $1.06 per share, from an earlier forecast of $1.15 per share, on Aramids business sale.  The company had previously forecast 2025 net sales of $12.85 billion.

raw.headline: DuPont revises 2025 net sales forecast to reflect Qnity spin-off

The company had previously forecast 2025 net sales of $12.85 billion.

headline: Qnity Electronics, Inc. to Host 2025 Investor Day on September 18, 2025 at 2:00pm ET
summary: Qnity Electronics, Inc. ("Qnity"), a premier technology solutions leader across the semiconductor value chain, will host a live video webcast of its inaugural Investor Day at 2:00 p.m. ET today, September 18, 2025. Qnity will provide an overview of its strategy, businesses, and growth objectives as an independent public company following its planned separation from DuPont (NYSE: DD), targeted for November 1, 2025.*

headline: DuPont to Outline Value Creation Strategy and Financial Framework
summary: DuPont (NYSE: DD) today is hosting its 2025 Investor Day with members of its senior leadership team to introduce the new DuPont portfolio following the intended spin-off of its electronics business, Qnity Electronics, Inc. (Qnity) on November 1, 2025(1). As part of the presentation, the senior leadership team will outline drivers to accelerate value creation, along with its expected financial framework.

(Qnity) on November 1, 2025(1). As part of the presentation, the senior leadership team will outline drivers to accelerate value creation, along with its expected financial framework.
